name: Bullet Hell Supplement Ruleset 1 (Changes Made)
description:
This adds on to the base game system, this is for both Version 2 and Version 2.1, 2.8, and 2.9 (That is eventually coming soon) of Bullet Hell Reverence. I noticed that 
-Large Halbert now has a Dynamic Kill. When the Pilot has 30 Health or less. The character is able to increase the roll, to go for an instant kill. They would need to roll a 6d9 to do it. 
-You can now rip people out of their Mecha! They'll need to be Lowered health, this can be anywhere between 20/10/ or in the 30's. I put it vague for a reason because, I wanted people to have fun with it. 
-I did add some more EN moves, nine actually. Everything else is pretty much the same, except for the added and organized EN moves. Things look nice, now.
